job.title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Engineer

HireltpgtltpgtCOVID PROTOCOL Must be fully vaccinatedltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtDescriptionltpgtltpgt Were looking for an innovative Google Cloud Platform GCP Engineer who is passionate and RDBMS concepts including primaryforeign keys indexing data types referential integrity ERD etcltpgtltpgt Familiarity with multiple GCP APIs Cloud Storage Vision Logging Monitoring Stackdriver Google App Engine DLP NLP Cloud Tasksltpgtltpgt Experience with IOT dataltpgtltpgt Minimum 2 certifications in GCPltpgtltpgt Working knowledge or experience with Java HTML andor JQuery is a plusltpgtltpgt Experience with web mapping tools and spatial databases is a plusltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWork experienceltpgtltpgt 2 to 4 years of experienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtEducationltpgtltpgt Bachelors
